text: Anatoma parageia is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Anatomidae. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * Geiger D. & Sasaki T. (2009). New Scissurellidae and Anatomidae from Manazuru, Sagami Bay, and Okinawa, Japan (Mollusca: Gastropoda: Vetigastropoda). Molluscan Research 29 (1) : 1-16 * Geiger D.L. (2012) Monograph of the little slit shells. Volume 1. Introduction, Scissurellidae. pp. 1-728. Volume 2. Anatomidae, Larocheidae, Depressizonidae, Sutilizonidae, Temnocinclidae. pp. 729–1291. Santa Barbara Museum of Natural History Monographs Number 7. ==External links== Category:Anatomidae Category:Gastropods described in 2009
title: Anatoma parageia
